Introduction to Habitat

Sitecore Habitat is a range of sites demonstrating the capabilities of the Sitecore Experience Platform.

The solution is built on the Sitecore Helix guidelines, which focuses on increasing productivity and quality in Sitecore projects.

Read more

Modules

The Habitat example implementation has a range of moudles which covers the basics of a Sitecore website.

Read more

Getting Started

Sitecore Helix as defined methodology with conventions and practices - Habitat is an example implementation available for your understanding.

Read more

Download Habitat Now!

Habitat is available as a Sitecore Package and the sourcecode is available on Github

Visit Habitat on Github

About Habitat

Habitat sites are demonstration sites for the Sitecore Experience Platform. The sites demonstrate the full set of capabilities and potential of the platform through a number of both technical and business scenarios.

Example available on GitHub
